title: AUTOMATIC-START WARNING
fullText:
Where a generating set is capable of automatic or remote manual starting, a warning sign shall be clearly visible on approach to, and located within 1 m of, the generating set, bearing the wordsâ€”
DANGER: THIS EQUIPMENT STARTS AUTOMATICALLY
NOTE: It is recommended that a similar sign be placed on the door/access route to the generator area, if appropriate.
The generator engine shall be provided with an isolation device to prevent the starting of the generator set when inspection, repair or maintenance is carried out. This device shall be clearly identified and instructions on its operation may be provided.
